name: Quack! (cvu232, thebatmanyo, CuriousIbrahim, ramishawasim, Nartgnoh, sarcastic_cat)
name_original: Quack! (cvu232, thebatmanyo, CuriousIbrahim, ramishawasim, Nartgnoh, sarcastic_cat)
description:
"Quack? Quack."

There's a lot of balls of fluff today. Aww, look at how they all bounce around alongside you! Oh no! A storm's separated all of you... Can you round everyone back together in this cute little game?

Controls:

[WASD/Arrow Keys] - Move around

[Spacebar] - Quack & include ducklings in your party

Gameplay:

Run around the map to find your lost ducklings. Be careful not to exclude any of those precious balls of fluff. Sometimes the ducklings might get left behind if you go too far, so make sure to check up on them!

The Team:

Alexandro Di Nunzio - Technical Artist

Catherine Turuta - UI Artist/Level Designer

Cindy Vu - 2D Animator/Environmental Artist

Hong Tran - Gameplay Programmer

Ibrahim Abdul Hammed - Gameplay Programmer

Ramisha Wasim - UI Artist/Environmental Artist

Asset Credits:

Music: Still of Morning by Eric Matyas
